005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnNot;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBase64BinaryItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDayTimeDurationItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDurationItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUntypedAtomicItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IYearMonthDurationItem;
024
025import java.util.Locale;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
030public final class ComparisonFunctions {
031  /**
032   * Comparison operators.
033   */
034  public enum Operator {
035    /**
036     * An equal comparison.
037     */
038    EQ,
039    /**
040     * A not equal comparison.
041     */
042    NE,
043    /**
044     * A less than comparison.
045     */
046    LT,
047    /**
048     * A less than or equal comparison.
049     */
050    LE,
051    /**
052     * A greater than comparison.
053     */
054    GT,
055    /**
056     * A greater than or equal comparison.
057     */
058    GE;
059  }
060
061  private ComparisonFunctions() {
062    // disable construction
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Compare the two items using the provided {@code operator}.
067   *
068   * @param leftItem
069   *          the first item to compare
070   * @param operator
071   *          the comparison operator
072   * @param rightItem
073   *          the second item to compare
074   * @return the result of the comparison
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  public static IBooleanItem valueCompairison(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem leftItem, @NonNull Operator operator,
078      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem rightItem) {
079    return compare(leftItem, operator, rightItem);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Compare the sets of atomic items.
084   *
085   * @param leftItems
086   *          the first set of items to compare
087   * @param operator
088   *          the comparison operator
089   * @param rightItems
090   *          the second set of items to compare
091   * @return a or an empty {@link ISequence} if either item is {@code null}
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  public static IBooleanItem generalCompairison( // NOPMD - acceptable complexity
095      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> leftItems,
096      @NonNull Operator operator,
097      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> rightItems) {
098
099    IBooleanItem retval = IBooleanItem.FALSE;
100    for (IAnyAtomicItem left : leftItems.getValue()) {
101      assert left != null;
102      for (IAnyAtomicItem right : rightItems.getValue()) {
103        assert right != null;
104        IAnyAtomicItem leftCast;
105        IAnyAtomicItem rightCast;
106        if (left instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
107          if (right instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
108            leftCast = IStringItem.cast(left);
109            rightCast = IStringItem.cast(right);
110          } else {
111            leftCast = applyGeneralComparisonCast(right, left);
112            rightCast = right;
113          }
114        } else if (right instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
115          leftCast = left;
116          rightCast = applyGeneralComparisonCast(left, right);
117        } else {
118          leftCast = left;
119          rightCast = right;
120        }
121
122        assert leftCast != null;
123        IBooleanItem result = compare(leftCast, operator, rightCast);
124        if (IBooleanItem.TRUE.equals(result)) {
125          retval = IBooleanItem.TRUE;
126        }
127      }
128    }
129    return retval;
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Attempts to cast the provided {@code other} item to the type of the
134   * {@code item}.
135   *
136   * @param item
137   *          the item whose type the other item is to be cast to
138   * @param other
139   *          the item to cast
140   * @return the casted item
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  private static IAnyAtomicItem applyGeneralComparisonCast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item,
144      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem other) {
145    IAnyAtomicItem retval;
146    if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
147      retval = IDecimalItem.cast(other);
148    } else if (item instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
149      retval = IDayTimeDurationItem.cast(other);
150    } else if (item instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
151      retval = IYearMonthDurationItem.cast(other);
152    } else {
153      retval = item.getJavaTypeAdapter().cast(other);
154    }
155    return retval;
156  }
157
158  /**
159   * Compare the {@code right} item with the {@code left} item using the specified
160   * {@code operator}.
161   *
162   * @param left
163   *          the value to compare against
164   * @param operator
165   *          the comparison operator
166   * @param right
167   *          the value to compare with
168   * @return the comparison result
169   */
170  @NonNull
171  public static IBooleanItem compare( // NOPMD - unavoidable
172      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem left,
173      @NonNull Operator operator,
174      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem right) {
175    @NonNull IBooleanItem retval;
176    if (left instanceof IStringItem || right instanceof IStringItem) {
177      retval = stringCompare(IStringItem.cast(left), operator, IStringItem.cast(right));
178    } else if (left instanceof INumericItem && right instanceof INumericItem) {
179      retval = numericCompare((INumericItem) left, operator, (INumericItem) right);
180    } else if (left instanceof IBooleanItem && right instanceof IBooleanItem) {
181      retval = booleanCompare((IBooleanItem) left, operator, (IBooleanItem) right);
182    } else if (left instanceof IDateTimeItem && right instanceof IDateTimeItem) {
183      retval = dateTimeCompare((IDateTimeItem) left, operator, (IDateTimeItem) right);
184    } else if (left instanceof IDateItem && right instanceof IDateItem) {
185      retval = dateCompare((IDateItem) left, operator, (IDateItem) right);
186    } else if (left instanceof IDurationItem && right instanceof IDurationItem) {
187      retval = durationCompare((IDurationItem) left, operator, (IDurationItem) right);
188    } else if (left instanceof IBase64BinaryItem && right instanceof IBase64BinaryItem) {
189      retval = binaryCompare((IBase64BinaryItem) left, operator, (IBase64BinaryItem) right);
190    } else {
191      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
192          null,
193          String.format("invalid types for comparison: %s %s %s", left.getClass().getName(),
194              operator.name().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT), right.getClass().getName()));
195    }
196    return retval;
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Perform a string-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
201   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
202   *
203   * @param left
204   *          the value to compare against
205   * @param operator
206   *          the comparison operator
207   * @param right
208   *          the value to compare with
209   * @return the comparison result
210   */
211  @NonNull
212  public static IBooleanItem stringCompare(@NonNull IStringItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
213      @NonNull IStringItem right) {
214    int result = left.compareTo(right);
215    boolean retval;
216    switch (operator) {
217    case EQ:
218      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left.compare(right),
219      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
220      retval = result == 0;
221      break;
222    case GE:
223      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left.compare(right),
224      // IIntegerItem.NEGATIVE_ONE);
225      retval = result >= 0;
226      break;
227    case GT:
228      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left.compare(right),
229      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
230      retval = result > 0;
231      break;
232    case LE:
233      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left.compare(right),
234      // IIntegerItem.ONE);
235      retval = result <= 0;
236      break;
237    case LT:
238      // retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left.compare(right),
239      // IIntegerItem.ZERO);
240      retval = result < 0;
241      break;
242    case NE:
243      // retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left.compare(right),
244      // IIntegerItem.ZERO));
245      retval = result != 0;
246      break;
247    default:
248      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
249          String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name())); // NOPMD
250    }
251    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(retval);
252  }
253
254  /**
255   * Perform a number-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
256   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
257   *
258   * @param left
259   *          the value to compare against
260   * @param operator
261   *          the comparison operator
262   * @param right
263   *          the value to compare with
264   * @return the comparison result
265   */
266  @NonNull
267  public static IBooleanItem numericCompare(@NonNull INumericItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
268      @NonNull INumericItem right) {
269    IBooleanItem retval;
270    switch (operator) {
271    case EQ:
272      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
273      break;
274    case GE: {
275      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left, right);
276      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
277      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
278      break;
279    }
280    case GT:
281      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericGreaterThan(left, right);
282      break;
283    case LE: {
284      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left, right);
285      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right);
286      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
287      break;
288    }
289    case LT:
290      retval = OperationFunctions.opNumericLessThan(left, right);
291      break;
292    case NE:
293      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opNumericEqual(left, right));
294      break;
295    default:
296      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
297    }
298    return retval;
299  }
300
301  /**
302   * Perform a boolean-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
303   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
304   *
305   * @param left
306   *          the value to compare against
307   * @param operator
308   *          the comparison operator
309   * @param right
310   *          the value to compare with
311   * @return the comparison result
312   */
313  @NonNull
314  public static IBooleanItem booleanCompare(@NonNull IBooleanItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
315      @NonNull IBooleanItem right) {
316    IBooleanItem retval;
317    switch (operator) {
318    case EQ:
319      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
320      break;
321    case GE: {
322      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opBooleanGreaterThan(left, right);
323      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
324      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
325      break;
326    }
327    case GT:
328      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanGreaterThan(left, right);
329      break;
330    case LE: {
331      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opBooleanLessThan(left, right);
332      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right);
333      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
334      break;
335    }
336    case LT:
337      retval = OperationFunctions.opBooleanLessThan(left, right);
338      break;
339    case NE:
340      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opBooleanEqual(left, right));
341      break;
342    default:
343      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
344    }
345    return retval;
346  }
347
348  /**
349   * Perform a date and time-based comparison of the {@code right} item against
350   * the {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
351   *
352   * @param left
353   *          the value to compare against
354   * @param operator
355   *          the comparison operator
356   * @param right
357   *          the value to compare with
358   * @return the comparison result
359   */
360  @NonNull
361  public static IBooleanItem dateTimeCompare(@NonNull IDateTimeItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
362      @NonNull IDateTimeItem right) {
363    IBooleanItem retval;
364    switch (operator) {
365    case EQ:
366      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
367      break;
368    case GE: {
369      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeGreaterThan(left, right);
370      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
371      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
372      break;
373    }
374    case GT:
375      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeGreaterThan(left, right);
376      break;
377    case LE: {
378      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeLessThan(left, right);
379      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right);
380      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
381      break;
382    }
383    case LT:
384      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateTimeLessThan(left, right);
385      break;
386    case NE:
387      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDateTimeEqual(left, right));
388      break;
389    default:
390      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
391    }
392    return retval;
393  }
394
395  /**
396   * Perform a date-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
397   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
398   *
399   * @param left
400   *          the value to compare against
401   * @param operator
402   *          the comparison operator
403   * @param right
404   *          the value to compare with
405   * @return the comparison result
406   */
407  @NonNull
408  public static IBooleanItem dateCompare(@NonNull IDateItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
409      @NonNull IDateItem right) {
410    IBooleanItem retval;
411    switch (operator) {
412    case EQ:
413      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
414      break;
415    case GE: {
416      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDateGreaterThan(left, right);
417      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
418      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
419      break;
420    }
421    case GT:
422      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateGreaterThan(left, right);
423      break;
424    case LE: {
425      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDateLessThan(left, right);
426      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right);
427      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
428      break;
429    }
430    case LT:
431      retval = OperationFunctions.opDateLessThan(left, right);
432      break;
433    case NE:
434      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDateEqual(left, right));
435      break;
436    default:
437      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
438    }
439    return retval;
440  }
441
442  /**
443   * Perform a duration-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
444   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
445   *
446   * @param left
447   *          the value to compare against
448   * @param operator
449   *          the comparison operator
450   * @param right
451   *          the value to compare with
452   * @return the comparison result
453   */
454  @NonNull
455  public static IBooleanItem durationCompare( // NOPMD - unavoidable
456      @NonNull IDurationItem left,
457      @NonNull Operator operator,
458      @NonNull IDurationItem right) {
459    IBooleanItem retval = null;
460    switch (operator) {
461    case EQ:
462      retval = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
463      break;
464    case GE:
465      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
466        IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
467            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
468            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
469        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
470        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
471      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
472        IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
473            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
474            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
475        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
476        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
477      }
478      break;
479    case GT:
480      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
481        retval = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationGreaterThan(
482            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
483            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
484      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
485        retval = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationGreaterThan(
486            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
487            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
488      }
489      break;
490    case LE:
491      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
492        IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationLessThan(
493            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
494            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
495        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
496        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
497      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
498        IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
499            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
500            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
501        IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right);
502        retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
503      }
504      break;
505    case LT:
506      if (left instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem && right instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem) {
507        retval = OperationFunctions.opYearMonthDurationLessThan(
508            (IYearMonthDurationItem) left,
509            (IYearMonthDurationItem) right);
510      } else if (left instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem && right instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem) {
511        retval = OperationFunctions.opDayTimeDurationLessThan(
512            (IDayTimeDurationItem) left,
513            (IDayTimeDurationItem) right);
514      }
515      break;
516    case NE:
517      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opDurationEqual(left, right));
518      break;
519    default:
520      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
521    }
522
523    if (retval == null) {
524      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
525          null,
526          String.format("The item types '%s' and '%s' are not comparable",
527              left.getClass().getName(),
528              right.getClass().getName()));
529    }
530    return retval;
531  }
532
533  /**
534   * Perform a binary data-based comparison of the {@code right} item against the
535   * {@code left} item using the specified {@code operator}.
536   *
537   * @param left
538   *          the value to compare against
539   * @param operator
540   *          the comparison operator
541   * @param right
542   *          the value to compare with
543   * @return the comparison result
544   */
545  @NonNull
546  public static IBooleanItem binaryCompare(@NonNull IBase64BinaryItem left, @NonNull Operator operator,
547      @NonNull IBase64BinaryItem right) {
548    IBooleanItem retval;
549    switch (operator) {
550    case EQ:
551      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
552      break;
553    case GE: {
554      IBooleanItem gt = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(left, right);
555      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
556      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(gt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
557      break;
558    }
559    case GT:
560      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryGreaterThan(left, right);
561      break;
562    case LE: {
563      IBooleanItem lt = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryLessThan(left, right);
564      IBooleanItem eq = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right);
565      retval = IBooleanItem.valueOf(lt.toBoolean() || eq.toBoolean());
566      break;
567    }
568    case LT:
569      retval = OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryLessThan(left, right);
570      break;
571    case NE:
572      retval = FnNot.fnNot(OperationFunctions.opBase64BinaryEqual(left, right));
573      break;
574    default:
575      throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.format("Unsupported operator '%s'", operator.name()));
576    }
577    return retval;
578  }
579
580  /**
581   * Compare the {@code right} item with the {@code left} item using the specified
582   * {@code operator}.
583   *
584   * @param left
585   *          the value to compare against
586   * @param right
587   *          the value to compare with
588   * @return the comparison result
589   */
590  @NonNull
591  public static IIntegerItem compareTo(
592      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem left,
593      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem right) {
594    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(left.compareTo(right));
595  }
596}
